value.desc: Controls state of fab actions (showing/hidden); Works best with v-model directive, otherwise use along listening to 'input' event

direction.desc: Direction to expand Fab Actions to

persistent.desc: By default, Fab Actions are hidden when user navigates to another route and this prop disables this behavior

glossy.desc: Apply the glossy effect over the button

default.desc: This is where QFabActions may go into

tooltip.desc: Slot specifically designed for a QTooltip

input.desc: Emitted when fab actions are shown/hidden; Captured by v-model directive
